summary: A demonstration game showcasing the Quaternion RTS mechanics. The player commanded AUREN forces, establishing early resource dominance through quantum core optimization. Mid-game saw tactical expansion to crystal nodes, culminating in a decisive victory through superior technological advancement and strategic unit positioning.

aiHighlights.reason: Strategic placement near ore-rich zones enabled 20% resource efficiency boost, establishing early economic advantage that persisted throughout the match.
Coordinated attack wave of 8 infantry units exploited enemy defensive gap, capturing critical biomass node and shifting map control to 60/40 advantage.
Timely energy surge powered advanced unit production, enabling the final push that overwhelmed enemy defenses through technological superiority.
